name: Neo Drift Out: New Technology
overview: Neo Drift Out: New Technology (NEO ドリフト アウト) is a 1996 rallying video game developed by Visco Corporation for the Neo Geo and Neo Geo CD. It is the fourth title in the Drift Out series; though it follows Super Drift Out: World Rally Championships, it is closer to the earlier Drift Out '94: The Hard Order.
